General.Name: Shenzhen Soling Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Soling Industrial Co.,Ltd provides car networking hardware and software services. Its products include MWR, HUD, rear-view mirror, ADAS, DVR, back seat infotainment device, TPMS, 360 monitor, telematics, bcaking camera, full LCD cluster, MIFI, t-box, OBD, IVI, and anti-fatigue system. The company offers IVI systems for passenger car infotainment systems and commercial vehicle products; and tire pressure monitoring systems. It also provides IOV management platform for vehicle data monitoring, fault reminder, location tracking, in-car entertainment, maintenance reminder, location sharing, electric vehicle management, vehicle remote control, collision reminder, real-time detection, car friends group, address book interaction, electric vehicle international and landmark docking, and overall security management. In addition, the company offers tire pressure monitoring systems. It sells its products to approximately 30 provinces and cities in China; and approximately 60 countries and regions in Europe, the United States, and Southeast Asia. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Mr. Gui Rong Zhong
2.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Sec. of the Board
